docs.title: up_alpha
docs.description: Alpha features. Commands may be removed in future releases.

docs.title: up_alpha_ctx
docs.description: Select an Upbound kubeconfig context.

docs.title: up_alpha_migration
docs.description: Migrate control planes to Upbound Managed Control Planes.

docs.title: up_alpha_migration_export
docs.description: The 'export' command is used to export the current state of a Crossplane or Universal Crossplane (xp/uxp) control plane into an archive file. This file can then be used for migration to Upbound Managed Control Planes.

docs.title: up_alpha_migration_import
docs.description: The 'import' command imports a control plane state from an archive file into an Upbound managed control plane.

docs.title: up_alpha_migration_pause-toggle
docs.description: The 'pause-toggle' command is used to pause or unpause resources affected by a migration, ensuring that only migration-induced pauses are undone.

docs.description: Interact with Spaces.

docs.description: Initialize an Upbound Spaces deployment.

docs.description: List all accessible spaces in Upbound.

docs.description: Managing the mirroring of artifacts to local storage or private container registries.
